ComicInfo.Title: War Games Part 3
ComicInfo.Writer: Karl Altstaetter,Rob Liefeld,Robert Place Napton,Robert Napton,Rob Liefeld,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton
ComicInfo.Summary: War Games Part 3: The Experts team up with DS-9 and Jackson to rescue Bloodstrike and Prophet from the hands of Wargame but Crypt gets there first. Unfortunately, Crypt's motive for freeing Prophet is so that he can try to kill him himself.
